body_html:
I am using this link to install torch http://torch.ch/docs/getting-started.html

while running the the ./install.sh It got terminated with this:

-- Installing: /home/saria/torch/install/include/luaT.h
-- Installing: /home/saria/torch/install/share/cmake/torch/luaTConfig.cmake
Updating manifest for /home/saria/torch/install/lib/luarocks/rocks
torch scm-1 is now built and installed in /home/saria/torch/install/ (license: BSD)

Updating manifest for /home/saria/torch/install/lib/luarocks/rocks
dok scm-1 is now built and installed in /home/saria/torch/install/ (license: BSD)

gcc -O2 -fPIC -I/home/saria/torch/install/include -c utils.c -o utils.o
gcc -shared -o treplutils.so -L/home/saria/torch/install/lib utils.o
gcc -O2 -fPIC -I/home/saria/torch/install/include -c readline.c -o readline.o
readline.c:8:31: fatal error: readline/readline.h: No such file or directory
#include <readline/readline.h>
^
compilation terminated.

Error: Build error: Failed compiling object readline.o

It is installing error. Also, there are no explanations how to add torch to anaconda environment.
I appreciate it if you give me the links as I searched a lot but no success

body:
I am using this link to install torch http://torch.ch/docs/getting-started.html

while running the the ./install.sh It got terminated with this:

-- Installing: /home/saria/torch/install/include/luaT.h
-- Installing: /home/saria/torch/install/share/cmake/torch/luaTConfig.cmake
Updating manifest for /home/saria/torch/install/lib/luarocks/rocks
torch scm-1 is now built and installed in /home/saria/torch/install/ (license: BSD)

Updating manifest for /home/saria/torch/install/lib/luarocks/rocks
dok scm-1 is now built and installed in /home/saria/torch/install/ (license: BSD)

gcc -O2 -fPIC -I/home/saria/torch/install/include -c utils.c -o utils.o
gcc -shared -o treplutils.so -L/home/saria/torch/install/lib utils.o
gcc -O2 -fPIC -I/home/saria/torch/install/include -c readline.c -o readline.o
readline.c:8:31: fatal error: readline/readline.h: No such file or directory
 #include <readline/readline.h>
                               ^
compilation terminated.

Error: Build error: Failed compiling object readline.o

It is installing error. Also, there are no explanations how to add torch to anaconda environment.
I appreciate it if you give me the links as I searched a lot but no success
